room_title: Escape room "Detective vs. Dillinger" by Escape Artistry in Chicago
review: We did the Dillinger room and it was both challenging and a lot of fun. Agent Zed was a great mission supervisor. Will definitely go back here for the other rooms.

room_title: Escape room "Detective vs. Dillinger" by Escape Artistry in Chicago
review: A great experience! Balanced puzzles with just the right about of guidance and clues, very satisfying results, fun themes, and immersive environments add up to an hour well-spent!

room_title: Escape room "Detective vs. Dillinger" by Escape Artistry in Chicago
review: We just did the Dillinger room and we loved it!!! Bandit was the best!! She was so fun and really got into the theme. We loved the set up before the actual game and she was fun and helpful. We've done a few escape games and really loved the theming and puzzles of this room. I would recommend it to anyone....we'll def be back for a different room!
